column.name: SERVICE_TICKET_POSITION_ID
column.comment: This attribute represents the unique identifier of the SERVICE TICKET POSITION.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: Data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: SERVICE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
column.comment: The Service Subscription unique identfier. This is the foreign key to the Service Subscription table.

column.name: CUSTOMER_ORDER_ID
column.comment: The unique identifier of a Customer Order. This is a foreign key to the Customer Order table.

column.name: USAGE_MODE_VALUE_RD
column.comment: This is the usage mode unique identifier. List of operations that can be applied to a service. These include reconfigure, activate, suspend, etc.

column.name: REASON_RD
column.comment: This data represents the reason for the SERVICE TICKET POSITION and is used to determine charges.

column.name: STATE_RD
column.comment: This attribute defines the state of the current Service Ticket Position.

column.name: ON_HOLD_INDICATOR
column.comment: This indicator specifies whether the Service Ticket Position is in an "on hold" status.

column.name: SERVICE_VERSION_CODE
column.comment: User Defined Unique Identifier of the Service Version

column.name: STATE_DATE
column.comment: This column`s data signifies the latest date on which the SERVICE TICKET POSITIONs state changes.

column.name: DESIRED_DATE
column.comment: This column stores the desired date for the activation of a SERVICE.

column.name: CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date on which the record was created

column.name: ORDER_DATE
column.comment: Date of Order

column.name: PROCESS_IMMEDIATELY_INDICATOR
column.comment: The Process Immediately Indicator is set to Yes if the Desired Date should be now, rather than sometime in the future.

column.name: SAME_DAY_VALUE
column.comment: This field is used as a counter, and is incremented each time a Service Ticket Position is created for the same Service Subscription o n the same day.

column.name: CANCEL_REASON_RD
column.comment: This attribute represents the reason why the SERVICE TICKET POSITION is cancelled and is used to determine charges.

column.name: DESIRED_SCHEDULE_TYPE_RD
column.comment: This data determines the schedule for SERVICE activation.

column.name: COMPLETION_DATE
column.comment: This column`s data represents the day that the SERVICE TICKET POSITION was provisioned. This date will be used to create fixed charges when sent to pricing.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is incremented on each update. Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the

column.name: SUB_ORDER_ID
column.comment: New field

column.name: DETAILED_REASON_RD
column.comment: Detailed information for column REASON_RD

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: NULL
